articles.author: The Athletic Staff
articles.title: AL wild-card race: Red Sox, Blue Jays win; Yankees, Mariners lose ground - The Athletic
articles.description: Four teams remain alive in the American League wild-card race, separated by two games: the Yankees, Red Sox, Mariners and Blue Jays.
articles.content: The Boston Red Sox and Toronto Blue Jays each won on Friday night, strengthening their hopes for an American League wild-card berth. Meanwhile, the New York Yankees saw their lead shrink but still mo… [+745 chars]

articles.author: Ben Everill, PGATOUR.COM
articles.title: Bryson DeChambeau chases more speed after bowing out in quarterfinals at Long Drive World Championships - pgatour.com
articles.description: MESQUITE, NV – PGA TOUR star Bryson DeChambeau will push to get bigger, faster and stronger after his ultra-impressive run at the Professional Long Drivers of America World Championships came to an end in the quarterfinals.
articles.content: On Friday he looked set to fall out in the round of 16 before he unleashed a 394-yard monster shot to win his fifth and final set enough to get him through to the final eight on the bubble. His best … [+1580 chars]

articles.title: An American tragedy: US COVID death toll tops 700,000 - ABC News
articles.content: The United States reached another grim milestone on Friday, as the confirmed coronavirus death toll topped 700,000, just over a year and a half into the pandemic, and despite the wide availability of… [+6846 chars]
